io.github.zachohara.bukkit.craftban

Class MaterialUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.zachohara.bukkit.craftban.MaterialUtil

  • public final class MaterialUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    The MaterialUtil class contains static methods that oversee all interactions with the lists of banned materials.
    Author:
    Zach Ohara

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,io.github.zachohara.bukkit.simpleplugin.persistence.PersistentList<org.bukkit.Material>> bannedMaterialsMap
      The collection of banned materials, sorted by banned purpose in the map.

      The MaterialUtil class should not be instantiable.

    • Field Detail

      • bannedMaterialsMap

        private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,io.github.zachohara.bukkit.simpleplugin.persistence.PersistentList<org.bukkit.Material>> bannedMaterialsMap
        The collection of banned materials, sorted by banned purpose in the map. Every map entry pair consists of a string representing a purpose (eg. "crafting", "smelting", etc.) and a MaterialsList of materials that are banned from that purpose.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MaterialUtil

        private MaterialUtil()
        The MaterialUtil class should not be instantiable.

    • Method Detail

      • toggleMaterialBan

        public static boolean toggleMaterialBan(io.github.zachohara.bukkit.simpleplugin.command.CommandInstance instance,
                                        java.lang.String purpose,
                                        java.lang.String reportPurpose)
        Bans the given material from the given purpose, and reports the sucess of the operation to the given CommandInstance.
        Parameters:
        instance - the CommandInstance that should be responded to.
        purpose - the activity that the returned list of materials is not allowed for ("crafting" for materials that can't be crafted, etc.).
        reportPurpose - the activity that the returned list of materials is not allowed for, but given in a form that will be reported to the user ("craft" instead of "crafting", etc).
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful; false otherwise.

      • toggleMaterialBan

        public static int toggleMaterialBan(java.lang.String purpose,
                                    java.lang.String materialName)
        Bans a given material from being used for the given purpose, or unbans the material if it is already banned when this method is called.
        Parameters:
        purpose - the activity that the banned material is not allowed for ("crafting" for materials that can't be crafted, etc.).
        materialName - the name of the material that should be banned or unbanned from the given purpose.
        Returns:
        0 if the operation fails, 1 if the material was previously not banned and now is banned, or 2 if the material was previously banned and now is not.

      • listBannedMaterials

        public static boolean listBannedMaterials(io.github.zachohara.bukkit.simpleplugin.command.CommandInstance instance,
                                          java.lang.String purpose,
                                          java.lang.String reportPurpose)
        Retrieves the list of materials, color it correctly, and then return it to the sender of the given command.
        Parameters:
        instance - the CommandInstance that should be responded to.
        purpose - the activity that the returned list of materials is not allowed for ("crafting" for materials that can't be crafted, etc.).
        reportPurpose - the activity that the returned list of materials is not allowed for, but given in a form that will be reported to the user ("craft" instead of "crafting", etc).
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful; false otherwise.

      • isMaterialBanned

        public static boolean isMaterialBanned(java.lang.String purpose,
                                       java.lang.String material)
        Determines if the given material is banned from being used for the given purpose.
        Parameters:
        purpose - the activity that the material should be tested for.
        material - the name of the material that should tested.
        Returns:
        true if the given material is banned from the given purpose; false otherwise.

      • getBannedList

        public static io.github.zachohara.bukkit.simpleplugin.persistence.PersistentList<org.bukkit.Material> getBannedList(java.lang.String purpose)
        Returns the list of materials that are banned from the given purpose.
        Parameters:
        purpose - the purpose to query for.
        Returns:
        the materials that are banned from the given purpose.
        See Also:
        bannedMaterialsMap

      • populateBannedMaterialsMap

        protected static void populateBannedMaterialsMap(io.github.zachohara.bukkit.simpleplugin.plugin.SimplePlugin owner)
        Populates the map of banned materials. This method is only called during plugin initialization
        Parameters:
        owner - the plugin that owns the banned material data files.
        See Also:
        bannedMaterialsMap
